sentences.sContent: These refugees are very grateful to the government's succor.
sentences.sContent_eng: These refugees are very grateful to the government's succor.
sentences.sCn: 这些难民非常感激政府的救援。

sentences.sContent: It is a stated purpose of the U. N. to succor countries in distress.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is a stated purpose of the U. N. to succor countries in distress.
sentences.sCn: 联合国有一条公开的宗旨，就是要援助陷于苦难的国家。

sentences.sContent: Objective: Methods are discussed to safeguard health of international medical-team member in succor.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective: Methods are discussed to safeguard health of international medical-team member in succor.
sentences.sCn: 目的：探讨国际灾害医疗救援队员的健康保障方法。

remMethod.val: succ (看作success， 成功) + or (人) → 救援人员成功救助受伤人 → 救援
